name: G.I.A.N.T.S
description:
G.I.A.N.T.S is a cooperative local multiplayer puzzle game for 4 players. Our vision for the game was to combine the qualities of Journey with the cooperation of Human Fall Flat, to deliver a hybrid experience that would be fun for all ages!

  • Features 7 complete puzzle levels, designed to be completed by 4 players cooperatively!
  • Features 2 unique crystal abilities to help you overcome the trials of this alien world, these are the Swell and Shrink abilities!
  • Features fully integrated xbox game pad support with mindful consideration to controller mapping to facilitate as many different player types as possible!
  • Features a colour blind friendly colour palette!
  • You can expect a full play through to take you roughly 1 hour. More experienced players may be able to complete it faster, maybe even faster than us!

G.I.A.N.T.S was the capstone final project for Tiny Sail Games, the team consisted of:

Nicholas Staracek - Gamerunner and Lead Designer

Nic Lyness - Project Manager and Designer

Adam Crompton - Designer

Caleb Barton - Lead Programmer

Jack Kuskoff - Programming

Pritish Choudhary - Programming

Ash Ball - Sound Designer and Audio Lead

Macauley Bell-Maier - Lead Animator

Kerry Ivers - Animation and Modeling

Peter Buck - Animation and Modeling

Thanks for playing our capstone final project! 

G.I.A.N.T.S has been featured in Kotaku AU - "What's Your Favourite Australian Game Of 2017?" 

G.I.A.N.T.S was awarded the Creative Achievement Award for the class of 2017 at SAE Qantm (Brisbane). G.I.A.N.T.S was recognized as being the best major project of any higher education program offered at SAE Brisbane for that year.
